metadata.title: CVE-2012-2320 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
ConnMan before 0.85 does not ensure that netlink messages originate fromthe kernel, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended accessrestrictions and cause a denial of service via a crafted netlink message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2320` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

connman - 1.15-0ubuntu3
connman-vpn - 1.15-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: connman package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15-0ubuntu3').
